<img src="images/profile.jpg" style="width:200px; border-radius:50%; float:right; margin-left:20px;">

Public Health Data Science graduate student at Columbia University with a strong background in Information Security and Law from Nankai University. Passionate about leveraging data science techniques to solve complex public health challenges.

I have experience in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data cleaning, with proficiency in R, Python, Java, C++ and SQL. My research interests include data quality improvement and AI applications in healthcare.
